our_values_dec: Darna Company's values are dedication to providing high-quality homes and effective contribution to improving urbanization and life in Egypt.
our_goals_dec: Our main goal is to achieve excellence in the real estate development industry by providing high quality homes and contributing to the improvement of the urban environment. We always work hard to meet our customers' expectations and successfully realize our vision.
our_vision_dec: Our vision is to achieve excellence and leadership in the real estate development industry by providing homes that exceed our customers’ expectations and contributing to improving the urban environment of Egypt. We always strive to satisfy our customers and achieve our goals successfully.
offer_title: Studio and garden are gift with every typical unit.

about_us_body1: Darna Real Estate Development is one of the leading companies in the field of real estate development in the New Cairo area. The company was established with more than 25 years of engineering and construction experience, and began its activity in this region with a distinctive strategy that aims to provide integrated real estate solutions characterized by the highest levels of quality and attention to the smallest details.
about_us_body2: This real estate journey begins with the stage of selecting distinctive locations for the projects. We carefully select strategic locations that match the needs and aspirations of our clients, ensuring that they benefit maximum from their real estate investments.
about_us_body3: We have a specialized engineering and administrative team that works to develop and implement projects with the highest levels of efficiency and quality. We pay attention to every detail at every stage of the development process, from design through construction and delivery.
about_us_body4: Our real estate products reflect our uniqueness and distinction. We always strive to provide integrated products that meet customer needs and are characterized by the highest levels of comfort, safety and luxury. We are keen to provide a unique and distinctive residential and investment experience to all our clients.
about_us_body5: We take pride in our commitment to achieving the highest standards of quality and excellence in the field of real estate development. Darna Real Estate Development always seeks to achieve the vision of ideal housing and successful investment for all.
about_us2_body1: Membership in the Egyptian Federation of Construction and Building Contractors: We are part of the efforts aimed at developing the construction industry in Egypt and ensuring that projects are implemented with the highest quality standards.
about_us2_body2: Membership in the New Cairo Developers Union: We are committed to active participation in the development of modern urban areas in Cairo.
about_us2_body3: Full ownership and implementation: We own and implement all our projects without participation, which allows us to fully control the implementation of projects and ensure the highest levels of quality are achieved.
about_us2_body4: Delivering successful residential projects: We presented many successful residential projects in areas such as October and the Beit Al Watan area in New Cairo. We always pay attention to the fine details and adherence to the highest finishing standards to ensure the delivery of high-end residential units.
about_us2_body5: Multiple projects in the Rabwa Fifth Settlement area: We have more than 20 projects in this vital area.
about_us2_body6: Fast scheduling: We always strive to deliver our projects in less than 4 years, which contributes to meeting our customers’ needs effectively.
